Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, west of Lyanden Lake.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent Lyanden Lake can be seen to the east. A small beach is formed as the water nears the shore formed by Rosecrest Street. On the west side of the road is the Evenborough Park, a quiet, serene park ideal for picnics, parties or just resting peacefully under the warming rays of the sun.
